modules.description: Provides functions to interact with abstract devices in MirageOS, including error reporting and pretty-printing. Works with device identifiers and error states specific to the MirageOS environment. Used to handle low-level device operations and diagnostics in network and storage components.

Provides functions to manage device disconnection and track device state. Operates on a custom type `t` representing device instances. Used to safely terminate device connections in network or storage contexts.
